info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 07 at 1:18PM PDT until August 08 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR LIGHTNING ON MONDAY... .Scattered thunderstorms will develop Monday afternoon in central Oregon as monsoonal moisture increases from northern Nevada. Thunderstorms will decrease by mid evening. The low levels will be very dry on Monday with limited wetting rain potential and gusty outflow winds expected. Monsoonal moisture will continue to increase on Tuesday with additional showers and thunderstorms, but these storms should contain more rainfall than on Monday. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM PDT MONDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR BURNS BLM...WHICH IS FIRE WEATHER ZONE 636... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM PDT Monday. * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered. * OUTFLOW WINDS...40-55 mph.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
